title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
content: Hi, guys as the title says, we are looking for a Whitepaper writer. If you are skilled in this field and if you are available to write another whitepaper let me know in this thread or Pm me in Bitcointalk with your portfolio as well as the pricing.Please don't spam if you have not any portfolio. Thank you.

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: Hey there, I'm a member of this forum since 2013 and have been writing for crypto-related topics since 2014. Since these weren't mentioned here, would you be kind enough to PM me with your budget and a small outline of your expectations? It's ok if you don't want to discuss these things publicly but these details are important. I hope that makes sense.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I have been writing articles and contents for projects for more than 6 years in the crypto space, I also did write whitepaper for two projects. I must say writing is fun for me but for me to write, I must know exactly what the project is about and how best to present it. I will not be best in technical writing and presentation but outside that, feel free to PM me with details of the project and also the budget you have available.

comments.author: kafeelniazi
comments.body: Pm you portfolio and contact, thanks
